text: Hernandia drakeana was a species of plant in the Hernandiaceae family. It was endemic to French Polynesia. ==References== * Florence, J. 1998. Hernandia drakeana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Hernandia drakeana
